message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper introduces a framework for automated skill acquisition in reinforcement learning using spatio-temporal abstractions and deep neural networks. This involves identifying hierarchical structures in the task, simplifying and speeding up reinforcement learning algorithms, and generalizing algorithms over multiple tasks without relearning policies from scratch. The paper also discusses the use of spectral clustering algorithms and deep learning techniques for representation learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses the use of video games as a testbed, which suggests that it could be relevant to the sub-categories cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
